results.name: 2n-th derivative of the Gaussian exp(-x^2) evaluated at x=0.
comment: H_n(0) := n-th derivative of exp(-x^2) at x=0. H_(2*n + 1)(0) = 0 if n >= 0. - _Michael Somos_, Jan 24 2014
formula: G.f.: 1/U(0) where U(k) = 1 + x*(2*k+2)/U(k+1); (continued fraction, 1-step). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Nov 14 2012
G.f.: 1/Q(0), where Q(k) = 1 - x*(8*k+2) + x*(8*k+4)/(1 - x*(8*k+6) + x*(8*k+8)/Q(k+1)); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, May 18 2013
